articles.title: The Human League, review: the things that pop dreams are made of - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: The '80s synth pioneers treated 12,000 fans at the SSE Wembley Arena to a propulsive, singalong set on what proved a heart-warming evening
articles.content: Forty years since their breakout third album, Dare!, the Human League sound like the world has just about caught up with them. In the night outside the refurbished SSE Wembley Arena, the parade of cu… [+3692 chars]
